content: a random act of kindness is a quick knit with big heart designed to inspire kindness to one another it is a textured triangular scarf knit on a bias in dk weight yarn making it a fast knit perfect for gift knitting or as an act of kindness to yourself this is a functional yet versatile knit perfect as an accessory to dress up an outfit or as a garment to keep one warm during cooler weather as with its sister-shawl pay it forward 1 a random act of kindness was created to spread sweetness it is a marvelous project for gift-knitting or giving to someone who could use an extra bit of warmth and kindness please follow me on instagram 3 facebook 4 or visit my website 5 for updates offers and other fun things thank you to ron pogue photography for the photos 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/pay-it-forward 2 https //www kiva org/lender/wolfandfaunknits 3 https //instagram com/wolfandfaunknits 4 https //www facebook com/wolfandfaunknits 5 www wolfandfaun com
